data.enText: something important, interesting or typical of a place or thing

data.chText: 这座城市的一个有趣特征就是古老的市场。
data.enText: An interesting feature of the city is the old market.

data.chText: 团队合作是这项训练计划的重要特点。
data.enText: Teamwork is a key feature of the training programme.

data.chText: 你挑选轿车时要着重哪些特点？
data.enText: Which features do you look for when choosing a car?

data.chText: 这个软件没有明显的特点。
data.enText: The software has no particular distinguishing features .

data.chText: 面容的一部分（如鼻、口、眼）
data.enText: a part of sb's face such as their nose, mouth and eyes

data.chText: 他轮廓分明的英俊面孔
她容貌中最引人注目的是她的双眼。
data.enText: Her eyes are her most striking feature .

data.chText: （报章、电视等的）特写，专题节目
data.enText: (in newspapers, on television, etc.) a special article or programme about sb/sth
the main film/movie in a cinema programme

data.chText: 以…为特色；由…主演；以…为主要组成
data.enText: to include a particular person or thing as a special feature

data.chText: 这部电影由卡里∙格兰特饰演一位教授。
data.enText: The film features Cary Grant as a professor.

data.chText: 最新款式的特色是合金车轮和电子报警器。
data.enText: The latest model features alloy wheels and an electronic alarm.

data.chText: 小册子列举的多家旅馆都有周末假日特别优待。
data.enText: Many of the hotels featured in the brochure offer special deals for weekend breaks.

data.chText: 起重要作用；占重要地位
data.enText: to have an important part in sth

data.chText: 橄榄油和大蒜在他的食谱中显得很重要。
data.enText: Olive oil and garlic feature prominently in his recipes.

means: 面容的一部分(如鼻、口、眼)
(报章、电视等的)特写，专题节目

ex.chText: 她有着孩子般的天真特质。
ex.enText: She has a childlike quality.

ex.chText: 木材的一个特性是可以燃烧。
ex.enText: One quality of wood is that it can burn.

ex.chText: 他在研究该金属的物理和化学特性。
ex.enText: He is studying the physical and chemical qualities of the metal.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指有形或无形的特性，也可指个性或共性的特征。

ex.chText: 一名优秀的领导者应具备哪些素质？
ex.enText: What attributes should a good leader possess?

ex.chText: 杰克拥有一流运动员应具备的所有特质。
ex.enText: Jake has all the attributes of a first-class athlete.

synonyms.bx: 指某人或某物特有的性质或属性，尤指好的、有用的特质。

ex.chText: 这两组患者具有截然不同的特点。
ex.enText: These two groups of patients have quite different characteristics.

ex.chText: 他最为突出的特点是诚实。
ex.enText: His predominant characteristic is honesty.

ex.chText: 物体的物理特征也应考虑进去。
ex.enText: The physical characteristics of objects should also be taken into account.

ex.chText: 这是他们与众不同的特征之一。
ex.enText: It is one of their distinguishing characteristics.

synonyms.bx: 指有别于其他人或事物的典型的、特殊的、本质的特性或特征，含易于辨认之意，通常用复数。

ex.chText: 这是我们社区大学的一个主要特点。
ex.enText: This is a key feature of our community college.

ex.chText: 眼睛是她五官中最好看的部位。
ex.enText: Her eyes are her best feature.

ex.chText: 韩国食物最显著的特点就是味道辛辣。
ex.enText: The most distinguishing feature of Korean food is the spiciness.

ex.chText: 荷兰重要的景观风貌是什么？
ex.enText: What are the important features of the landscape in Holland?

synonyms.bx: 指引人注目的显著特征或细节，多用于说明人或事物的主要特征，也可用于说明地理特征等。

ex.chText: 没有一部成文宪法是该国的一大特点。
ex.enText: The lack of a written constitution is a peculiarity of the country.

ex.chText: 生有育儿袋是有袋动物的一个特点。
ex.enText: Pouches are a peculiarity of marsupials.

synonyms.bx: 指地方、人、情况等的独特之处。

ex.chText: 我们来比较一下这两种物质的物理特性。
ex.enText: Let's compare the physical properties of the two substances.

ex.chText: 这种容器保温性能很好。
ex.enText: This container has good heat-retaining properties.

synonyms.bx: 多指同类事物所共有的特性，通常用复数。

ex.chText: 遗传的性格特征
ex.enText: genetic traits

ex.chText: 他最讨人喜欢的两大个性特点是慷慨与和蔼可亲。
ex.enText: His two most pleasing traits are generosity and amiability.

ex.chText: 该医学研究以某些性格特征为基础。
ex.enText: The medical research was based on particular personality traits.

synonyms.bx: 多指人的性格或性情特征，尤指先天的性格特征。

tr: an article of merchandise that is displayed or advertised more than other articles
the characteristic parts of a person's face: eyes and nose and mouth and chin
example: an expression of pleasure crossed his features

tr: a prominent attribute or aspect of something
example: the map showed roads and other features
generosity is one of his best characteristics

tr: (linguistics) a distinctive characteristic of a linguistic unit that serves to distinguish it from other units of the same kind
a special or prominent article in a newspaper or magazine
example: they ran a feature on retirement planning

tr: the principal (full-length) film in a program at a movie theater

example: This restaurant features the most famous chefs in France

tr: wear or display in an ostentatious or proud manner
example: she was sporting a new hat

value.def: A feature of something is an interesting or important part or characteristic of it.

example.ex: Patriotic songs have long been a feature of Kuwaiti life...
example.tran: 爱国歌曲长期以来一直是科威特生活的一个特色。

example.ex: The spacious gardens are a special feature of this property...
example.tran: 大花园是这处房产的特色。

example.ex: Perhaps the most unusual feature in the room is an extraordinary pair of candles.
example.tran: 也许，这间屋子最与众不同之处就是一对非同寻常的蜡烛。

value.def: Your features are your eyes, nose, mouth, and other parts of your face.

example.tran: 他的容貌似乎有所改变。

value.def: When something such as a film or exhibition features a particular person or thing, they are an important part of it.

example.ex: It's a great movie and it features a Spanish actor who is going to be a world star within a year...
example.tran: 这是一部精彩的影片，主演是一位西班牙演员，他不出一年就会成为国际巨星。

example.ex: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games...
example.tran: 这个时长一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍最近比赛的精彩片断。

example.ex: This spectacular event, now in its 5th year, features a stunning catwalk show.
example.tran: 这一盛事如今已是第 5 个年头，其重头戏是一场精彩纷呈的时装秀。

value.tran: 由…主演;以…为主要内容;重点介绍

value.def: If someone or something features in something such as a show, exhibition, or magazine, they are an important part of it.

example.ex: Jon featured in one of the show's most thrilling episodes.
example.tran: 乔恩主演剧中最引人入胜的剧集之一。

value.tran: 出演重头戏;担任主演;(在展览、杂志中)为重点推出的部分

value.def: A feature is a special article in a newspaper or magazine, or a special programme on radio or television.

example.ex: We are delighted to see the Sunday Times running a long feature on breast cancer.
example.tran: 我们高兴地看到《星期天时报》发表了有关乳腺癌的长篇专题文章。

example.ex: ...a special feature on the fund-raising project.
example.tran: 有关集资项目的专题报道

value.tran: (报刊或杂志的)特写，专题;(电台或电视台的)特别节目

value.def: A feature or a feature film or movie is a full-length film about a fictional situation, as opposed to a short film or a documentary.

example.ex: ...the first feature-length cartoon, Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs.
example.tran: 第一部卡通长片《白雪公主和七个小矮人》

value.def: A geographical feature is something noticeable in a particular area of country, for example a hill, river, or valley.
value.tran: 地理特征;地形地物;地貌

trans: 剧情片；长片；故事片；劇情片；正片
依恋情结；依恋情节；特性羡慕；特性依恋；眷恋情结
最佳纪录片；最佳纪录长片；最佳记录长片；长片奖；最佳紀錄長片
特点；明显要素；区别特征
特征提取；特征抽取；特徵粹取；特征抽出；特性提取
结构特性；构造形迹；结构特征；结构特徵；特点
